name: Chikipi

ability.name: Egg Layer
ability.description: Sometimes lays an Egg when assigned to Ranch.

description: Extremely weak and far too delicious. It is one of the weakest Pal alongside Lamball. No matter how many are hunted, they just keep appearing.

skills.name: Chicken Rush
skills.description: Chikipi's special skill. Flies at enemies in its sights, attacking them with its sharp beak.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Implode
skills.description: Risks its life to cause a violent explosion. Becomes incapacitated afterwards.

skills.name: Grass Tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Sand Tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Flare Storm
skills.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.
